ActorTalk: Glad you're alright.
Sorry about that... It was an emergency. I put your safety first, but I didn't manage the thrusters well enough.
My scan shows the fireflies are on that floating platform up ahead.
Froggie's legs are too short to make the jump, ribbit...
Commandant, take my hand. I'll fly us over.
We've got the golden fireflies, Commandant. Let's head back—
Commandant, look out—!
Hold on tight, Commandant.
You're not hurt, are you, Commandant?
The forest really is as dangerous as the books say, ribbit! Did you find the golden fireflies up there?
Froggie, are these the fireflies you were looking for?
That's right! Give them to Froggie, ribbit.
Now we just have to give them to Mama Mole!
Oh, and ribbit, when we see Mama Mole, don't mention anything about the "loop."
Are you worried about something?
If Mama Mole finds out about the loop, her wish would become tainted with a desire to help Froggie.
Wish Dewdrops have to stay pure. If any conflicting feelings get mixed in, they'll cloud up and stop working.
Besides, Froggie doesn't want Mama Mole to worry. I want her to experience the moment her wish comes true with nothing but pure happiness.
I've gone on long enough. Let's go give these fireflies to Mama Mole!
I'm okay.
Just a little dizzy...
